      • readAll

        public static java.lang.String readAll(java.io.File file)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an entire UTF-8 text file into memory as a String. This can handle various line ending conventions, but line endings will be converted into the underlying platform's default.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
